item.title: Source Questions
item.dc:creator: @Harris6310 Harris6310
item.description:
@Harris6310 wrote:

[quote=“bily123, post:2, topic:357408”]1. private void customCommand(String command) {
You post commands under this section of client.java
2. The command to tell you your coordinates is

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }[/quote]

Thankyou, I’m now going to test it out.

Edit: I can’t find client.java.
Edit2: I have found it, but when I search for that code, I find nothing.
Edit3: I have found command.java. I am going to try and put the code in there.

Read full topic
